description: Define a sequence of 2^n X 2^n squares as follows: S_0 = [1], S_1 = [1,2; 3,4]; S_2 = [1,2,5,6; 3,4,7,8; 9,10,13,14; 11,12,15,16], etc.; sequence gives triangular array whose n-th row gives differences between successive columns of n-th square.
author: Tidjani Negadi (t-negadi(AT)usa.net), May 21 2000
